original_text: And the earth was without form, and void; and darkness was upon the face of the deep. And the Spirit of God moved upon the face of the waters.
korean_text: 땅이 혼돈하고 공허하며 흑암이 깊음 위에 있고 하나님의 영은 수면 위에 운행하시니라

sentences.original_text: And the earth was without form
and darkness was upon the face of the deep
And the Spirit of God moved
upon the face of the waters
